name: Sharon Malone
resume_snippet: Sharon Malone  PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:  For the past twenty-six years, work experience has been in environmental chemistry as supervisor of sample receiving departments, HPLC, GC, AA and IC chemist, project manager assistant, quality control coordinator and presently clinical quality assurance lead of personal care and cosmetic clinical studies.
